TopicTitle: [WIP] Never Enuff Dakka:- A BDArmory expansion [Release 3]

Articles.Content: Total destruction -3-
For me the tank chasis are a bit wonky. The turret never goes on correctly and neither do the tracks.
The Challenger and Chieftain bodies need to have their collisions meshes re-worked, the Scorpion should be working fine though.

> 
> Think we could get the Polish Stealth tank someday?
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fvUoHBZmqDw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Stealth tank doesn't really work... but it looks ridiculously cool.

I'm just gonna leave this here for anyone to use

I've been farting around with the textures for awhile now and I've come up with these edits that make these weapons match stock parts a little better.

Bare in mind this is the work of someone just messing around and applying no real skill.

if anyone wants to use them go ahead, anyone has full permission to do whatever you want with these.

Download link:

[http://www./download/x17w6f4vnakh7zn/Never+Enuff+sorta+stock-alike.zip](http://www./download/x17w6f4vnakh7zn/Never+Enuff+sorta+stock-alike.zip)

![RGM8yyK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RGM8yyK.jpg)
I would like to make a particular request. The M60A2E1/E2 Starship. I'm not sure if the dual ammo (ATGM/HE shell) would be doable, but either way It'd be awesome

but be sure to take your time on what you want to do, PT. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

M60 starship is best Patton. Do want.

Haven't been doing much recently, but there's a SU-152 gun in the works as a fatter alternative to the M102 and a second fictional tank turret to complement the Leviathan.
Been playing too much Wargame ALB lately. It's awesome. Looking forward to any updates!
sorry for being a noob but where do you put the control module for the tanks?

> 
> sorry for being a noob but where do you put the control module for the tanks?

What I do is first use a modular girder that can stick anywhere, then attach a probe core to that
oh thanks man, is that included in the mod or vanilla?
ok thanks man
No problem. Always nice to help out.

Hey proto do you perhaps need a Space battleship weapon testing platform?

im dabbling into tweakscale again. might be able to make something nice and fancy.
I built a Bork cube which works pretty well for that.

Not to be pushy or a ...., but any kind of schedule for when we might see some new stuff? My cold war battle scenarios are overflowing in my head and I need more cool .... to use than what I've whipped up on my own. Hes currently working on finishing up University work, then he has a few things for Flansmod (Minecraft Mod) that he has to do first, he initially set up this pack so that he could fool around with BDarmoury, 

He usually Makes parts for this mod when he has nothing else to do. 

Thought i would drop in to say it for him, since hes probably asleep right now.
Oh ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif). Didn't know that. Thanks a bunch

I've found a bit of a glitch - basically if you right click and toggle the scimitar turret, then toggle it again (deactivate it) then the turret turns off but simultaneously flips on its side (?) idk is there a fix for it?

- - - Updated - - -

Wait nvm I think i had an old version sorry xD
yeah, makes sure to report bugs here, but be sure to read the comments so that you don't report the same bug over and over. i should really get proto to take tally on what bugs are found.
yeah i will do. thanks again man

everything is now working perfectly, i love this mod so much now, thanks again

Can you make the 127mm gun that is on the Arleigh Burke class destroyers? and maybe Phalanx AA that takes 20mm?

> 
> Can you make the 127mm gun that is on the Arleigh Burke class destroyers? and maybe Phalanx AA that takes 20mm?

Phalanx CIWS already exists. Lord Prometheus rebooted the defunct Spanner's Boomsticks addon to BD Armory that had it. Check it out on the BD Armory forum main page
